'''Österreichische Tolkiengesellschaft''', ÖTG, (Austrian Tolkien Society) is the [[Tolkien Societies|Tolkien Society]] in Austria.

==History==
ÖTG was founded on 20 September 2002.<ref>http://oetg.org/oetg/uber-uns/ (accessed 05-12-2011)</ref> ÖTG organizes national events annually and also has a number of local chapters throughout Austria. ÖTG typically attends the Oxonmoot as well as other events in neighbouring countries (Germany, Italy and Slovenia).

==Publications==
ÖTG publishes ''Halfirien''.<ref>http://oetg.org/oetg/halifirien/ (accessed 05-12-2011)</ref> 25 issues have appeared through 2011.
